title: Felicity Jones and director husband Charles Guard blend into the crowd as they grab coffee
text:
They keep their marriage predominantly out of the spotlight, despite her being a major Hollywood star.

And Felicity Jones and her director husband Charles Guard blended into the crowd as they headed out on a stroll near their London home on Tuesday.

The actress, 36, and the filmmaker, 46, opted for low-key ensembles as they grabbed a takeout coffee during their morning walk.

Low-key: Felicity Jones and her director husband Charles Guard blended into the crowd as they headed out on a stroll near their London home on Tuesday

The Aeronauts star wrapped up against the chilly autumnal weather in a black wool coat, teamed with skinny jeans and an oversize scarf in shades of grey.

Felicity kept comfortable in a pair of Converse high-top trainers, accessorising with dark shades.

The On The Basis Of Sex leading lady wore her brunette hair scraped back from her face and went make-up free to display her naturally beautiful features.

Charles - who is best known for 2009 horror film The Uninvited - also opted for a casual ensemble, wrapping up in a navy jacket, jumper and shirt, worn with camel cords.

Loved-up: The actress, 36, and the filmmaker, 46, opted for low-key ensembles as they grabbed a takeout coffee during their morning walk

Caffeine fix: The Aeronauts star wrapped up against the chilly autumnal weather in a black wool coat, teamed with skinny jeans and an oversize scarf in shades of grey

The film director wore taupe Chelsea boots and dark sunglasses as he strolled through the city streets with his arm wrapped lovingly around his wife.

Felicity was no doubt enjoying a well-earned break after a busy few months promoting her new movie, The Aeronauts, alongside co-star Eddie Redmayne, 37.

The film is due for release on November 6 and sees the pair team up for a second time after appearing in Oscar-winning drama The Theory of Everything in 2014.

The Aeronauts plot follows pilot Amelia Wren (Felicity) and scientist James Glaisher (Eddie) as they find themselves in life-threatening situations while attempting to fly a hot air balloon higher than ever before to discover more about the weather.

A well-earned break: Felicity kept comfortable in a pair of Converse high-top trainers, accessorising with dark shades

Au natural: The On The Basis Of Sex leading lady wore her brunette hair scraped back from her face and went make-up free to display her naturally beautiful features

Felicity and husband Charles were married at Sudeley Castle, near Winchcombe, Gloucestershire, in July 2018.

The low-key actress opted to wear a 'budget' dress, which - despite its relatively low price - was an elegant full-sleeved white gown with sheer fabric and a frilled neck.

The couple's big day had an impressive guest list, with A-list stars including the bride's The Theory of Everything co-star Eddie Redmayne and Hollywood icon Tom Hanks.

The director popped the question in May 2017 after just two years of dating.

Prior to her relationship with Charles, Felicity dated sculptor Ed Fornieles for 10 years until 2013, after meeting when they were both students at Oxford University.

Hard at work: Felicity was no doubt enjoying a well-earned break after a busy few months promoting her new movie, The Aeronauts, alongside Eddie Redmayne, 37 (pictured October 7)
description: The actress, 36, and her film director husband, 46, blended into the crowd as they headed out on a stroll near their London home on Tuesday.
